Question: In 1999, his wealth briefly surpassed $101 billion, causing the media to call this person a "centibillionaire".
Hints: As an executive, this person met regularly with Microsoft's senior managers and program managers.
While at Harvard, he met Steve Ballmer, who later succeeded this person as CEO of Microsoft.
The ____ Millennium Scholars program has been criticized for its exclusion of Caucasian students.
